channel.title: How long do you have to wait when switching villages
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "How long do you have to wait when switching villages" - do you have to wait 48 hours or 2 dayroll between switching villages

item.title: Re: How long do you have to wait when switching villages
item.content:encoded: You can also buy a Televillage Potion to quickly let you join another village, without having to wait for those 2 day rolls. I think it sells for about 6k ryo at the store.

item.title: Re: How long do you have to wait when switching villages
item.content:encoded: It is two dayrolls. If you are looking for a village try Ordinary. I am the kage, we have all the content unlocking upgrades and summon monsters regularly.

item.title: How long do you have to wait when switching villages
item.content:encoded: do you have to wait 48 hours or 2 dayroll between switching villages? thanks
